content.text:
# Draft:Leon Howard (YouTuber)

----
Leon Howard (born 1982) is a CEO, Investor, & Educator. He is self-made millionaire from New Orleans, Louisiana, currently based out of Atlanta, Georgia.
He runs the popular YouTube program Trappin' Tuesdays on the Wall Street Looks Like Us Now Network.
When he was 16 years old he was sentenced to 10 years in prison for attempted murder.
During his time in prison, he learned about the stock market from a fellow inmate.
After getting out of prison, he became an ironworker, and used most of his earnings to invest in the stock market.
Leon has been a featured guest on the Ellen Degeneres Show, the Lewis Howes podcast, featured on The Street.
